Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja's 3 for 28 restricted Australia to 199
KL Rahul scored 97* (115) while Virat Kohli contributed 85 (116)
India chased down 201 with 6 wickets to spare
India won by 6 wickets with 52 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma: 'Good feeling to come out on top. (Bowling and fielding) Magnificent. Especially the fielding. The fielding was something we really put our effort on.'
Rohit Sharma: 'In conditions like this it can be tough sometimes. We knew there would be assistance for everyone. Seamers got reverse, spinners bowled in nice areas. All in all a great effort.'
Rohit Sharma: 'Some loose shots there as well. But that happens, you want to get off the mark and score quickly in the powerplay.'
Rohit Sharma: 'Hats off to Virat and KL - the way they stuck out there to create a match-winning partnership.'
Rohit Sharma: 'That will be the biggest challenge moving forward because we will play in different conditions. Might have to change combinations too and as a team we are prepared to do that.'
Rohit Sharma: 'Chak de India' reverberates around the stadium and time, now, for a breather.
Miscellaneous Highlights: KL Rahul and Virat Kohli shared a match-winning partnership
India's Jasprit Bumrah took 2/35 (10) while Josh Hazlewood took 3/38 (9)
